title: A Philosopher’s Duty? | Julian Baggini
description:
Looking for a link we mentioned? It's here: https://linktr.ee/philosophyforourtimes

Should it be a philosopher’s duty to discuss politics? And how can philosophy be used to improve public life? This week we’re discussing the roles and responsibilities of philosophers and the everyday applications of philosophy.

Julian Baggini is a philosopher, journalist and the author of philosophy books for a general audience. He is co-founder of The Philosophers' Magazine and has written for international newspapers and magazines.
